text: Genival Lacerda Cavalcante (5 April 1931 – 7 January 2021) was a Brazilian forró singer-songwriter. He was born in Campina Grande, Paraíba.(28 June 2007). Genival Lacerda é assaltado e bandidos levam instrumentos , O Globo(25 March 1995). Latin Notas, Billboard His best known songs were Severina Xique- Xique, Radinho de Pilha and O Chevette da Menina. In December 2017, Lacerda was honored with the Order of Cultural Merit.(19 December 2017). Genival Lacerda recebe Ordem do Mérito Cultural no Palácio do Planalto , Jornal da Paraíba Lacerda died on January 7, 2021, in Recife, Pernambuco from COVID-19, aged 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Recife Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:People from Paraíba
title: Genival Lacerda
